      • trainNetwork

        public void trainNetwork(double[][][][] in,
                         double[][] out,
                         int batchSize,
                         int epochs)
                  throws InvalidOperationException,
                         InvalidDimensionException
        Description copied from interface: Optimizer
        Fit the network to an approximate mapping between the given inputs and outputs.
        Specified by:
        trainNetwork in interface Optimizer
        Parameters:
        in - Array of 3D inputs to the network for training.
        out - Array of 1D expected outputs corresponding to the inputs.
        batchSize - Number of inputs that should be in training batches.
        epochs - Number of times the inputs should be trained on.
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException
        InvalidDimensionException
